function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Covid-19 social distancing measures leading to long queues and reduced shopping efficiency.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Change in consumer privacy attitudes due to covid-19 crisis","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shift in consumer behavior towards online shopping and e-commerce","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unsanitary surfaces and lack of hand disinfecting points","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Consumers’ fear of contamination and increased reluctance to get close to other people and potentially contaminated objects.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Severe metamorphosis in the service sector, driven by government regulations safeguarding public health and consumers’ mindset.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases due to close contact in retail settings","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Closure of retail establishments leading to economic impact","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited resources of the government may impact the effectiveness of support for consumer loans in housing and automotive industry.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Backlog in car production due to surge in demand after support for consumer loans.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased cooperation between government and financial sector may lead to efficient management of economic crises.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased marketing expenditures in banking and food service industries","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of accurate pandemic predictions and forecasts","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of trust and reassurance among consumers","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of fast and deliberate response to the crisis","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to act quickly on learnings and develop innovative service products for food service businesses","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased risk of contagion due to face-to-face contact in food service industry","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of decreased customer confidence in banking services","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate social distancing measures in restaurants and cafes","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate hygiene standards in food service establishments","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate monitoring of staff health and provision of protective clothing","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sending food to healthcare workers in various hospitals may contribute to the spread of contagious diseases if proper hygiene measures are not taken in the food preparation and delivery process.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Financial impact on restaurants and cafes if the campaign is not successful","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risks of fraud or misuse of the check system","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of proactive actions in crisis phase","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on reactive measures","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective learning from crisis experiences","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in home delivery services leading to higher interaction between delivery personnel and customers","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difficulty in persuading people to purchase ready-made food due to safety concerns","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of the virus within bank branches due to close customer and employee interactions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Resistance from customers intimidated by increased digitalization, leading to potential exclusion from banking services","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased loans in ’other loans’ category indicate potential household debt accumulation","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid increase in loan stock may indicate excessive risk-taking by banks","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Effective marketing may have led to increased borrowing and debt accumulation","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sharp decline at the end of march followed by a rise in april and may","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rising trend in online shopping and credit card usage","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Banks giving importance to protecting loans and assets","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decrease in consumer confidence leading to reduced expenditures","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decline in industrial production and retail sales","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Drop in credit card expenditures","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Simplified procedures for banking transactions could lead to increased cyber security risks.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Encouraging face-to-face transactions in branch for certain transactions could increase the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Physical contact during cash transactions at atms","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High usage of call centers","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases in bank branches due to lack of social distancing and contact reduction measures.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduction in business volumes due to limited access to physical branches and preference for face-to-face banking.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty stemming from the interdependence of participants in an exchange","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Crisis situations can damage a quality relationship","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Bank customers are results driven and care about functional quality","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Decrease in demand for banking services due to decline in economic activity","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"}]}
